item.title: CVE-2021-36850|2024-09-16T19:31:41.719Z -- meow%20apps -- media%20file%20renamer%20%E2%80%93%20auto%20%26%20manual%20rename%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress Media File Renamer â€“ Auto & Manual Rename plugin (versions <= 5.1.9). Affected parameters "post_title", "filename", "lock". This allows changing the uploaded media title, media file name, and media locking state.
